import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { Grid, Row, Col, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { FormGroup, ControlLabel, FormControl } from "react-bootstrap"; import Sidebar from "../navigation/Sidebar.js"; import Header from "../navigation/Header.js"; import { setCurrentUser } from "../../redux/actions/User/SetUserAction"; class UserProfile extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { email: "", firstName: "", lastName: "", phoneNumber: "", gender: "", verified: "" }; } async componentDidMount() { const temp = await this.props.setCurrentUser(); console.log(this.props.user.currentUser.me.data.me); const user = this.props.user.currentUser.data; this.setState({ email: user.email, firstName: user.firstName, lastName: user.lastName, phoneNumber: user.phoneNumber, gender: user.gender, verified: user.verified }); } render() { return (

Info

Verified
); } } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { currentUser: state.currentUser }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, { setCurrentUser })(UserProfile);
